CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Work_Order__r.Schedule_Freeze__c)), NOW()< Work_Order__r.Schedule_Freeze__r.End_Date__c , NOW()> Work_Order__r.Schedule_Freeze__r.Start_Date__c ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the appointment is currently impacted by a schedule freeze
CustomField.label: Frozen
